IN.IC: je oblika za sedanjik, preteklik in pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
To undercut someone
ali
to undercut their prices
pomeni prodajati neki izdelek ceneje kot nekdo drug.

seg.quote: The large-scale producer can usually undercut smaller competitors.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
undercuts someone's attempts to achieve something
, človeku preprečuje, da bi dosegel določen cilj.

seg.quote: The delay would surely undercut efforts to force modernization.
